scripts.start: node -e "require('http').createServer((req, res) => require('fs').readFile('.' + (req.url === '/' ? '/app.html' : req.url), (err, data) => { if (err) { res.writeHead(404); res.end(JSON.stringify(err)); return; } res.writeHead(200); res.end(data); })).listen(8080, () => console.log('Server running on http://localhost:8080'))"
